# Auditio Consults & Hearing Aids Tender Notice

## General Information

* Title (English): Audiology Consults & Hearing Aids
* Title (French): Consultations en Audiologie et Fournitures d'Appareils Auditifs
* Reference Number: PW-KIN-655-8698
* Amendment Number: 0
* Solicitation Number: 21401-200002/B
* Publication Date: 2022-10-05
* Tender Closure Date: 2022-10-26T14:00:00

## Tender Notice

###  Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)
The Correctional Service of Canada requires services from a supplier to provide audiology consults and hearing aids at Warkworth Institution. The services required include:

* Audiology consultations
* Hearing tests
* Repairs of hearing aids
* Fitting and maintenance of hearing aids
* Provision of written documentation for clients' medical files and the institutional medical doctor

### Requirements and Notice to Suppliers

* Suppliers are required to submit their bids electronically using Canada Post epost Connect.
* The requirements of this solicitation cancel and supersede previous bid solicitation PW-KIN-655-8698 dated August 15, 2022.
* A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders who bid in the previous solicitation.
* This requirement has a security requirement and suppliers must adhere to security protocols.
* The deadline for bid submission is October 26, 2022, at 14:00 Eastern Standard Time (EST).
* Suppliers must submit their bids electronically through the Canada Post epost Connect.
* Faxed and hard copy bids will not be accepted.

### Contact Information

* Contracting Entity: Public Works and Government Services Canada
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5
* Contact Person: Semple, Patrick
* Contact Info: (613) 449-3112 or via email to patrick.semple@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca

### Security Requirement

This requirement has a security requirement. Suppliers must comply with the security protocols stipulated in the public tender documents.
